label: IN THE PAST 24 HOURS: have YOU had any of the following (CHECK ALL THAT APPLY):
value_constraints: A scratchy throat;A painful sore throat;A cough (worse than usual if you have a baseline cough);A runny nose;Symptoms of fever or chills;A temperature greater than 100.4 °F or 38.0 °C;Muscle aches (worse than usual if you have baseline muscle aches);None of the above;Nausea, vomiting or diarrhea;Shortness of breath;Unable to taste or smell;Red or painful eyes
source_file: survey_data_dictionary_origcopy.csv - Daily COVID-19 Citizen Science Survey 27.csv

label: Did you seek medical care for these symptoms?
source_file: survey_data_dictionary_origcopy.csv - Daily COVID-19 Citizen Science Survey 27.csv

label: IN THE PAST 24 HOURS, has ANYONE (other than you) in your household had ANY of those symptoms? (scratchy/sore throat, cough, runny nose, fevers/chills/high temperature, muscle aches, nausea/vomiting/diarrhea, shortness of breath, unable to taste or smell, red or painful eyes)
source_file: survey_data_dictionary_origcopy.csv - Daily COVID-19 Citizen Science Survey 27.csv

label: IN THE PAST 24 HOURS, approximately how many people outside of your household did you interact with while they were within 6 feet?  (""Interact"" is loosely defined as talking, touching, or just being within 6 ft of someone for longer than 1 or 2 minutes).
source_file: survey_data_dictionary_origcopy.csv - Daily COVID-19 Citizen Science Survey 27.csv

label: Approximately what percent of those people were wearing masks, or were behind a shield?
